3. Property¶

3.1. Properties¶

class mcts.properties.properties.CycleProperty2DDecorator(property_decorated)[source]¶

Cycle property

calculate()[source]¶

Call the calculate method of the property then calculate the size of the longest cycle before returning the RDKit mol

Returns:RDKit mol
class mcts.properties.properties.DFTPropertyDecorator(property_decorated)[source]¶

DFT property

calculate()[source]¶

Call the calculate method of the property then launch the DFT before returning the RDKit mol

Returns:RDKit mol

LogP property

calculate()[source]¶

Call the calculate method of the property then calculate the LogP before returning the RDKit mol

Returns:RDKit mol

function to decorate a class with “<”

3.2. DFT¶

mcts.properties.dft.calcul_dft(id_smiles, smiles, m)[source]¶

Convert the SMILES into RDKit mol, get the position of the atoms with obabel, launch OTP with gaussian if the OTP has a normal termination then launch TD return the oscillator strength and wavelength

Parameters:
  • id_smiles (int) – id of the SMILES
  • smiles (SMILES) – SMILES to analyse
  • m (RDKit mol) – mol version of the SMILES
Returns:

Oscillator Strength and wavelength in nm, ev and cm-1
mcts.properties.dft.compress_file(file)[source]¶

Compress the file if exist, delete it and move it

Parameters:file (str) – the file to compress and delete
Returns:None
mcts.properties.dft.delete_file(file)[source]¶

Delete the file if exist

Parameters:file (str) – the file to delete
Returns:None
mcts.properties.dft.move_file(file)[source]¶

Move the file to generated/dft/

Parameters:file (str) – the file to move
Returns:None
